channel.title: Ant-eater on Cool Stuff

item.title: Ant-eater
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 6” / 15 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. ant-eater pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in off-white, light brown and pink (leftover) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (10 mm) Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing body (start in off-white yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]
